subject: p15518538
History: Year old man with fever and RLL crackles, evaluate for developing pneumonia evaluate for developing pneumonia.
Findings: Median sternotomy wires are again seen with fractures of the superior most wires. The cardiomediastinal and hilar contours are within normal limits. Lungs are well expanded and clear. There is no focal consolidation, pleural effusion or pneumothorax.
